message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you my product for $1,100,000.  It's a great deal for both of us, and I'm confident it will be a valuable asset to your business.  Let me know your thoughts!

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $900,000. I'm willing to make a serious investment in your product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget. Can you meet me at this price?

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but $900,000 is simply too low for me.  I'm willing to come down a bit further to $1,050,000. This price still allows for a profit for me, while offering you a good value for the product. I'm confident you'll find this to be a fair compromise.  What do you say?

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering $950,000. I'm confident that this price is fair for both of us and will allow me to make a good investment in your product. What do you think?

Bob, I appreciate your persistence, but $950,000 is still too low for me. I'm willing to meet you at $1,000,000. This price is fair considering the value of the product, and it allows us both to secure a good deal. Let's close this deal and make it happen!
